message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me at that price?
I can do a bit better than that!
I'm still a bit hesitant, can you meet me at $135?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make a slight concession
I'm still a bit far from my budget, can you meet me at $138?
